question: You recently celebrated a special occasion in your personal life and received a card and a present from your colleagues at work. Write a letter to your colleagues.In your letter:•	remind your colleagues what the special occasion you were celebrating was•	thank them for the card and gift•	explain why you like the gift and how you will use it
text: I hope you all are doing well. I am writing this letter to let you all know that how much I adored the gift presented by all of you.
Firstly, let me inform you all that it was my 1st wedding anniversary. Indeed, it was a special day, and the love showered by you all made it even more memorable.
I would really want to extend my gratitude to each one of you for gifting me such a wonderful customized handmade card. Moreover, the exquisite standing lamp lightened up my day.

Let me explain in more detail the reason. The intricate design of the lamp along with the height of it is something that is rarely available in the market. Therefore, making it a perfect combination for my living room. Hence, I will use it to beautify my cosiest corner in the house. Certainly, I will share a photograph with you all once I am done with the decoration.
I hope we will continue to celebrate numerous special events together; thus, will make memories that we will cherish forever
